ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to build multi-arch via Podman CURL / API.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description When trying to pass in `--platform` equivalent within the API, I am getting this parsing error: ``` {"cause":"invalid argument","message":"failed to parse query parameter 'platform': \"linux/arm64,linux/amd64\": invalid platform syntax for --platform=\"linux/arm64,linux/amd64\": \"arm64,linux\" is an invalid component of \"linux/arm64,linux/amd64\": platform specifier component must match \"^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$\": invalid argument","response":400} ``` ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. Package any Containerfile (`tar -czf context.tar.gz -C dir .`) 2.
